Package model

Class Hexagon

java.lang.Object
model.Hexagon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
District, Place, Quarries
public abstract class Hexagon extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a tile on the game grid.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Hexagon

      public Hexagon(Point3D p)
      Constructor to create a tile with specified coordinates using a Point3D.
      Parameters:
      p - The position of the tile.

    • Hexagon

      public Hexagon(int x, int y)
      Constructor to create a tile with specified coordinates using x and y. The z-coordinate is set to 1 by default.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the tile.
      y - The y-coordinate of the tile.
